thread.section_title: Bronson Safety Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bronson Safety | bronsonsafety.com.au
thread.title: Nina

author: Nina
title: Nina
text:
It was very easy ordering the goods and they were delivered promptly. They were a very good price and good quality.
Unfortunately as the two signs were stacked and were larger/heavier than I thought they would be one and when they were unwrapped one of the signs was cracked at the top. It can still be used but maybe you need to use more bubble wrap as well as all the packing tape before delivering them.
